colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES BKA' BSRUNG CHEN PO SKYES MCHOG RDO RJE LEGS PA LA GSUR MCHOD 'BUL TSUL DAM CAN DGYES PA BSKYED PA'I MCHOD SPRIN CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DGOS PA'I DBANG GIS GRUB MCHOG DHARMA BADZRA GSUNG LA GZHI BYAS NAS, ,BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS SA SKYONG GI LO NAG PA ZLA BA'I YAR TSES STOBS 'BYOR PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I NYIN MOR SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG DAM CAN BSRUNG MAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS 'GRUB GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
